results.content: I'm learning a lot of very useful things. Definitely a good course if you want to demystify the developer tools.

results.content: This instructor is definitely an amateur at teaching and creating videos, he likes to type in places that is not visible on the screen, showing things half cropped and love to rush an explanation and sometimes even just neglect all of it and give the answer. Please save your time and don't buy this course...

results.content: Learned some new things. I guess this might be more for beginners to React. I thought I would learn more. Some of the challenge explanations felt a bit rushed too.
